童年虐待会引起压力，从而改变成长过程中的神经网络和功能童年时期的忽视和/或虐待会引起极端压力，从而显着改变生长过程中的神经网络和功能。这可能导致精神疾病，包括抑郁症和精神分裂症，但控制它的确切机制和手段尚未被发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230804/Childhood-abuse-can-induce-stress-that-c​​hanges-neural-networks-and-functions-during-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230804/Childhood-abuse-can-induce-stress-that-c​​hanges-neural-networks-and-functions-during-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5b4586d-7155-450f-9108-66879e5d8a0e Fri, 04 Aug 2023 06:09:00 -0400 Childhood abuse can induce stress that changes neural networks and functions during growth

新型 PCNA 抑制剂 AOH1996 显示出选择性杀伤癌细胞和抑制肿瘤的潜力研究描述了一种增殖细胞核抗原（PCNA）的小分子抑制剂，可以选择性杀死癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230804/New-PCNA-inhibitor-AOH1996-shows-selective-cancer-cell-killings-and-tumor-suppression-pottial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230804/New-PCNA-inhibitor-AOH1996-shows-selective-cancer-cell-killings-and-tumor-suppression-pottial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1990ba52-bf54-43cf-bf86-32da9723a6d9 Fri, 04 Aug 2023 04:46:00 -0400 New PCNA inhibitor AOH1996 shows selective cancer cell killings and tumor suppression potential
